TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Freezable extends System.Windows.DependencyObject
Public MustInherit Class Freezable Inherits DependencyObject
public ref class Freezable abstract : System::Windows::DependencyObject

summary.span: 定義具有可修改狀態和唯讀 (凍結) 狀態的物件。

span.span: Defines an object that has a modifiable state and a read-only (frozen) state.

summary.span: 衍生自 的類別可以提供詳細變更告知、可以設為不變的，而且可以自我複製。

span.span: Classes that derive from provide detailed change notification, can be made immutable, and can clone themselves.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供特殊功能，可協助使用是相當費時的修改或複製的物件時，改善應用程式效能。The class provides special features that can help improve application performance when using objects that are expensive to modify or copy. 範例物件包括下列：Examples of objects include the following: - - - - - ## 衍生自可凍結Deriving From Freezable 類別衍生自獲得下列功能：A class that derives from gains the following features: - 特殊狀態： 唯讀 （凍結） 狀態和可寫入狀態。Special states: a read-only (frozen) state and a writable state. - 執行緒安全： 凍結可以跨執行緒共用物件。Thread safety: a frozen object can be shared across threads. - 詳細的變更通知： 不同於其他物件子屬性值變更時，物件會提供變更通知。Detailed change notification: Unlike other objects, a object provides change notifications when sub-property values change. - 容易複製： Freezable 的類別已實作數個方法可產生深層複製品。Easy cloning: the Freezable class has already implemented several methods that produce deep clones. 如需有關使用，並建立您自己詳細物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information on using and creating your own objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

threadsafe.span: 任何 public此類型的成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any public members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 當屬性是、物件可存取只會從其建立所在的執行緒。

span.span: When the property is , a object can be accessed only from the thread on which it was created.

threadsafe.span: 嘗試存取另一個執行緒則會擲回從。

span.span: Attempting to access it from another thread throws an .

threadsafe.span: 和方法提供支援封送處理至正確的執行緒。

span.span: The and methods provide support for marshalling to the correct thread.

threadsafe.span: 當其屬性是，物件是無限制執行緒。

span.span: When their property is , objects are free-threaded.

threadsafe.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 初始化 衍生類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是抽象類別的受保護存取範圍建構函式。This is the protected-accessibility constructor of an abstract class.

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否可以將物件設為不可修改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object can be made unmodifiable.

value.span: 如果可以將目前的物件設為不可修改，或是目前的物件已經不可修改，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the current object can be made unmodifiable or is already unmodifiable; otherwise, .

para.span: 此方法實作會使用方法設來判斷是否可以設為不可修改。

span.span: This method implementation uses the method with set to to determine whether a can be made unmodifiable.

para.span: 若要修改此屬性在衍生類別中的行為的方式，覆寫方法。

span.span: To modify the way this property behaves in a derived class, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Changed As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 或所含的物件遭到修改時。

span.span: Occurs when the or an object it contains is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您嘗試新增或移除事件處理常式，當目前的物件不是可修改時 (當屬性是`true`)，會擲回例外狀況。If you attempt to add or remove event handlers when the current object is not modifiable (when the property is `true`), an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Freezable Clone() cil managed

summary.span: 建立這個 的可修改複製，製作這個物件值的深層複製。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of the , making deep copies of the object's values.

summary.span: 當複製這個物件的相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製運算式 (但可能已不再解析)，但不會複製動畫或其目前值。

span.span: When copying the object's dependency properties, this method copies expressions (which might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性仍為 。

span.span: The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法會產生的可修改複製品凍結物件 (方法也複製未凍結的物件)。The and methods produce modifiable clones of frozen objects (the methods also clone objects that are not frozen). 複製品實際上是目前物件的深層複本。The clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object. 下表摘要說明之間的差異和方法。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |動作Action|再製方法行為Clone method behavior|CloneCurrentValue 方法行為CloneCurrentValue method behavior| |------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------------| |複製相依性屬性的運算式Copying a dependency property that has an expression|運算式會被複製，但可能不能再解析。The expression is copied, but might no longer resolve. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).|複製目前的運算式值，而不是運算式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |複製動畫相依性屬性Copying an animated dependency property|屬性的基底 （非動畫） 值會複製。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.|複製屬性的目前的動畫的值。The property's current animated value is copied. 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.| 請注意，不會複製未設定的屬性。Note that unset properties are not copied. 如果未設定的屬性，具有預設值是凍結，屬性值會維持在否則可修改複製品中都已凍結。If an unset property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone. ## 在執行緒之間移動 FreezableMove a Freezable Between Threads 這個方法可用於移動執行緒之間。This method can be useful for moving a between threads. 首先，請藉由呼叫無法修改其方法。First, make the unmodifiable by calling its method. 現在可以存取另一個執行緒並進行本機能夠存取。Now another thread can access the and make a local that it can access.

para.span: 這個方法會使用產生複製品。

span.span: This method uses to produce the clone.

para.span: 若要修改的行為，這個方法在衍生類別中覆寫方法。

span.span: To modify the behavior of this method in a derived class, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CloneCore(class System.Windows.Freezable sourceFreezable) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub CloneCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)

span.span: The object to clone.

summary.span: 使用基底 (非動畫) 屬性值，將執行個體設為指定 的複製品 (深層複製)。

span.span: Makes the instance a clone (deep copy) of the specified using base (non-animated) property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

block.para:
如果您是衍生自，您可能需要覆寫這個方法。
If you derive from , you may need to override this method.
若要覆寫的原因包括：
Reasons to override include the following:
- 您的衍生的類別會具有不會公開透過相依性屬性的資料。Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.
- 您的衍生的類別必須執行額外的初始設定工作無法完成的作業只是覆寫。Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .比方說，這適用於您的衍生的類別實作。For example, this applies if your derived class implements .類別，將所有的資料儲存在相依性屬性和，不需要執行額外的初始設定工作不需要覆寫。Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .它是不可或缺的所有實作都呼叫這個方法的基底實作。It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.實作應該只會執行不會執行的預設實作的工作。Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.預設實作會建立所有可寫入的本機設定屬性，包括內部的運算式的深層複本。The default implementation makes deep copies of all writable, locally set properties, including internal expressions.如果物件具有資料繫結的相依性屬性，則運算式會複製，但是可能不能再解析。If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the expressions are copied but might no longer resolve.如需複製的資料繫結物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).如果物件具有動畫相依性屬性，則會複製這些屬性的基底 （非動畫） 值。If the object has animated dependency properties, the base (non-animated) value of those properties is copied.不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.請注意，未設定的屬性不會複製，也不是唯讀屬性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.如果這類屬性具有預設值是凍結，屬性值會維持在否則可修改複製品中都已凍結。If such a property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone.下列清單摘要說明此方法預期的行為：The following list summarizes the expected behavior for this method:
- 所產生的複本包含的所有複本子物件。The copy produced contains copies of all sub-objects.
- 不會複製未設定和唯讀屬性。Unset and read-only properties are not copied.
- 會複製運算式。Expressions are copied.
- 任何這些子物件已遭到凍結上建立。None of these sub-objects are frozen on creation.
- 複本本身不會凍結。The copy itself is not frozen.
- 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.
- 屬性基底值是複製而非目前的動畫的值。Only property base values are copied, not current animated values.

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

span.span: The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法會產生的可修改複製品凍結物件 (方法也複製未凍結的物件)。The and methods produce modifiable clones of frozen objects (the methods also clone objects that are not frozen). 複製品實際上是目前物件的深層複本。The clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object. 下表摘要說明之間的差異和方法。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |動作Action|再製方法行為Clone method behavior|CloneCurrentValue 方法行為CloneCurrentValue method behavior| |------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------------| |複製相依性屬性的運算式Copying a dependency property that has an expression|運算式會被複製，但可能不能再解析。The expression is copied, but might no longer resolve. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).|複製目前的運算式值，而不是運算式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |複製動畫相依性屬性Copying an animated dependency property|屬性的基底 （非動畫） 值會複製。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.|複製屬性的目前的動畫的值。The property's current animated value is copied. 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.| 請注意，不會複製未設定的屬性。Note that unset properties are not copied. 如果未設定的屬性，具有預設值是凍結，屬性值會維持在否則可修改複製品中都已凍結。If an unset property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone. ## 在執行緒之間移動 FreezableMove a Freezable Between Threads 這個方法可用於移動執行緒之間。This method can be useful for moving a between threads. 首先，請使用無法修改其方法。First, make the unmodifiable by using its method. 現在可以存取另一個執行緒並讓它可以存取的本機複本。Now another thread can access the and make a local clone that it can access.

para.span: 這個方法會使用方法以產生複製;實作者會覆寫必須確保複本上建立不已凍結。

span.span: This method uses the method to produce the clone; implementers who override must ensure that the copy is not frozen on creation.

span.span: The to be cloned.

summary.span: 使用目前的屬性值，讓執行個體成為指定之 的可修改複本 (深層複本)。

span.span: Makes the instance a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the specified using current property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

block.para:
如果您是衍生自，您可能需要覆寫這個方法。
If you derive from , you may need to override this method.
若要覆寫的原因包括：
Reasons to override include the following:
- 您的衍生的類別會具有不會公開透過相依性屬性的資料。Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.
- 您的衍生的類別必須執行額外的初始設定工作無法完成的作業只是覆寫。Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .比方說，這適用於您的衍生的類別實作。For example, this applies if your derived class implements .類別，將所有的資料儲存在相依性屬性和，不需要執行額外的初始設定工作不需要覆寫。Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .它是不可或缺的所有實作都呼叫這個方法的基底實作。It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.實作應該只會執行不會執行的預設實作的工作。Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.預設實作會建立所有可寫入的本機設定屬性的深層複本。The default implementation makes deep copies of all writable, locally set properties.如果物件包含相依性屬性的運算式 （例如資料繫結），而不是運算式本身複製運算式的目前值。If the object contains dependency properties with expressions (such as a data binding), the current value of the expression is copied but not the expression itself.如果物件具有動畫相依性屬性，複製目前的動畫的值，這些屬性時，但不是動畫。If the object has animated dependency properties, the current animated value of those properties is copied, but the animations are not.請注意，未設定的屬性不會複製，也不是唯讀屬性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.如果這類屬性具有預設值是凍結，屬性值會維持在否則可修改複製品中都已凍結。If such a property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone.下列清單摘要說明此方法預期的行為。The following list summarizes the expected behavior for this method.
- 所產生的複本包含的所有複本子物件。The copy produced contains copies of all sub-objects.
- 不會複製未設定和唯讀屬性。Unset and read-only properties are not copied.
- 如果屬性動畫效果，會複製其目前值，但本身不會。If a property is animated, its current value is copied, but the animation itself is not.
- 任何這些子物件已遭到凍結上建立。None of these sub-objects are frozen on creation.
- 複本本身不會凍結。The copy itself is not frozen.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
The new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是受保護的方法，而且相依於覆寫實作實際特定物件的實作行為方法，這個方法會在內部呼叫這個方法。This is a protected method, and the actual object-specific implementations for the behavior are dependent on the override implementation of the method, which this method calls internally.

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the derived class.
The new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿呼叫這個方法，直接 （只是呼叫基底實作中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 這個方法在內部呼叫方法時的新執行個體建立。This method is called internally by the method whenever a new instance of the is created. ## Examples 下列範例示範典型實作。The following example shows a typical implementation of . [!code-csharp[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/CSharp/freezablesample.cs#createinstancecoreexample)] [!code-vb[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/visualbasic/freezablesample.vb#createinstancecoreexample)]

para.span: 每個衍生的類別必須實作這個方法。

span.span: Every derived class must implement this method.

para.span: 一般的實作會直接呼叫預設建構函式，並傳回結果。

span.span: A typical implementation is to simply call the default constructor and return the result.

summary.span: 將 物件設為不可修改的再將它的 屬性設定為 ，或者測試是否可以將 物件設為不可修改的。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免發生的可能性呼叫此方法時，請檢查屬性來判斷是否可以為不可之前呼叫這個方法。To avoid the possibility of an when calling this method, check the property to determine whether the can be made unmodifiable before calling this method.

para.span: 這個方法會使用方法以進行為不可修改。

span.span: To modify freezing behavior, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal static bool Freeze (System.Windows.Freezable freezable, bool isChecking);
.method familyorassemblystatic hidebysig bool Freeze(class System.Windows.Freezable freezable, bool isChecking) cil managed
protected public: static bool Freeze(System::Windows::Freezable ^ freezable, bool isChecking);

param.name: freezable
param.span: 要檢查或設為不可修改的物件。

span.span: The object to check or make unmodifiable.

param.span: 如果 isChecking 為 ，則會檢查物件，判斷是否可以將它設為不可修改的。

span.span: If isChecking is , the object is checked to determine whether it can be made unmodifiable.

param.span: 如果 isChecking 為 ，則會盡可能將物件設為不可修改。

span.span: If isChecking is , the object is made unmodifiable, if possible.

param.name: isChecking
param.span: 表示傳回是否可以凍結物件 (而不是實際進行凍結)， 則表示實際凍結物件。

span.span: to return an indication of whether the object can be frozen (without actually freezing it); to actually freeze the object.

summary.span: 如果 參數是 ，則這個方法表示是否可以將指定的 設為不可修改的。

span.span: If the parameter is , this method indicates whether the specified can be made unmodifiable.

summary.span: 如果 參數是 ，則這個方法會嘗試將指定的 設為不可修改的，並表示作業是否成功。

span.span: If the parameter is , this method attempts to make the specified unmodifiable and indicates whether the operation succeeded.

returns.span: 如果 是 ，則這個方法會在可以將指定的 設為不可修改的時傳回 ，並在無法設為不可修改的時傳回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the specified can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 如果 是 ，則這個方法會在指定的 現在為不可修改的時傳回 ，並在無法設為不可修改的時傳回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the specified is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿呼叫這個方法，除非衍生自和覆寫方法。Do not call this method unless you are deriving from and overriding the method. 這個方法可用於凍結其本身的類別資料成員的方法物件。This method may be used in the method to freeze class data members that are themselves objects. 它是保險起見上再次呼叫此方法已遭凍結 （不可修改） 的物件。It is alright to call this method again on a object that is already frozen (unmodifiable).

exception.span: 當 是 時，將 設為不可修改的嘗試失敗了。這個物件現在是處於未知的狀態 (可能是局部凍結)。

span.span: When is , the attempt to make unmodifiable was unsuccessful; the object is now in an unknown state (it might be partially frozen).

para.span: 這個方法會使用方法以進行為不可修改。

span.span: This method uses the method to make the unmodifiable.

para.span: 若要修改凍結行為，請覆寫方法。

span.span: To modify freezing behavior, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool FreezeCore(bool isChecking) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function FreezeCore (isChecking As Boolean) As Boolean

param.name: isChecking
param.span: 表示傳回是否可以凍結物件 (而不是實際進行凍結)， 則表示實際凍結物件。

span.span: to return an indication of whether the object can be frozen (without actually freezing it); to actually freeze the object.

summary.span: 將 物件設為不可修改的，或測試是否可以將它設為不可修改的。

span.span: Makes the object unmodifiable or tests whether it can be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 如果 是 ，則這個方法會在可以將 設為不可修改的時傳回 ，並在無法設為不可修改的時傳回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 如果 是 ，則這個方法會在指定的 現在為不可修改的時傳回 ，並在無法設為不可修改的時傳回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the if the specified is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿呼叫這個方法，直接 （只是呼叫基底實作中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 這個方法在內部呼叫屬性 (與`isChecking`等於`true`) 和方法 (具有`isChecking`等於`false`)。This method is called internally by the property (with `isChecking` equal to `true`) and the method (with `isChecking` equal to `false`).

para.span: 類別包含不會儲存使用相依性屬性的資料時，實作者必須覆寫這個方法。

span.span: implementers must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties.

para.span: 一般的實作會呼叫基底，然後可以呼叫靜態方法上所有型別的屬性，其中包含類別，傳回只有當所有屬性凍結 （或可能有已凍結，在指定的情況下如)。

span.span: A typical implementation would call base, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of specifying for ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Freezable GetAsFrozen() cil managed

summary.span: 使用基底 (非動畫) 屬性值，建立 的凍結複本。

span.span: Creates a frozen copy of the , using base (non-animated) property values.

summary.span: 因為複本已凍結，所以會以傳址方式複製任何凍結子物件。

span.span: Because the copy is frozen, any frozen sub-objects are copied by reference.
A frozen copy of the .

returns.span: 複本的 屬性是設定為 。

span.span: The copy's property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該檢查屬性，才能呼叫這個方法可讓您確認可以凍結。You should check the property before calling this method to verify that the can be frozen. 使用這個方法是類似於建立複本，使用，然後將它與凍結方法。Using this method is similar to creating a copy using the and then freezing it with the method. 和方法可以提高複製的效能，因為它們不會複製子物件的已凍結; 它們只能參考所複製。The and methods can improve copying performance because they do not clone sub-objects that are already frozen; they only copy them by reference. 下表摘要說明之間的差異和方法。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |動作Action|GetAsFrozen 方法行為GetAsFrozen method behavior|GetCurrentValueAsFrozen 方法行為GetCurrentValueAsFrozen method behavior| |------------|---------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |複製相依性屬性的運算式Copying a dependency property that has an expression|方法會擲回因為它無法屬性。The method throws an because it cannot the property.|複製目前的運算式值，而不是運算式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |複製動畫相依性屬性Copying an animated dependency property|屬性的基底 （非動畫） 值會複製。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.|複製屬性的目前的動畫的值。The property's current animated value is copied. 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.| 請注意，未設定的屬性不會複製，也不是唯讀屬性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties. 若要建立一份也就是不被凍結，使用方法。To create a copy of the that is not frozen, use the method.

exception.span: 包含運算式或動畫屬性，因此無法予以凍結。

span.span: The cannot be frozen because it contains expressions or animated properties.

para.span: 這個方法會使用虛擬方法以產生複製品。

span.span: This method uses the virtual method to produce the clone.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetAsFrozenCore(class System.Windows.Freezable sourceFreezable) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub GetAsFrozenCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)

span.span: The instance to copy.

summary.span: 使用基底 (非動畫) 屬性值，將執行個體設為所指定 的凍結複製品。

span.span: Makes the instance a frozen clone of the specified using base (non-animated) property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

block.para:
如果您是衍生自您可能需要覆寫這個方法。
If you derive from you may need to override this method.
若要覆寫的原因包括：
Reasons to override include the following:
- 您的衍生的類別會具有不會公開透過相依性屬性的資料。Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.
- 您的衍生的類別必須執行額外的初始設定工作無法完成的作業只是覆寫。Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .比方說，這適用於您的衍生的類別實作。For example, this applies if your derived class implements .類別，將所有的資料儲存在相依性屬性和，不需要執行額外的初始設定工作不需要覆寫。Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .它是不可或缺的所有實作都呼叫這個方法的基底實作。It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.實作應該只會執行不會執行的預設實作的工作。Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.預設實作會建立任何凍結的 freezable 和的所有其他可寫入的淺層複本、 在本機上設定屬性，它包含的深層複本。The default implementation makes deep copies of any unfrozen freezables and shallow copies of all other writable, locally set properties it contains.如果物件具有資料繫結的相依性屬性，運算式會複製，但可能不能再解析;如需複製的資料繫結物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the expressions are copied but might no longer resolve; for more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).如果物件具有動畫相依性屬性，則會複製這些屬性的基底 （非動畫） 值。If the object has animated dependency properties, the base (non-animated) values of those properties are copied.不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.請注意，未設定的屬性不會複製，也不是唯讀屬性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.如果您不要覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底實作。If you do override this method, you must call the base implementation.您不需要值的複製。You do not need to values as they are copied.結果由凍結在傳回之前。The result is frozen by before being returned.

A frozen copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法是類似於建立複本，使用，然後將它與凍結方法。Using this method is similar to creating a copy using the and then freezing it with the method. 和方法可以提高複製的效能，因為它們不會複製子物件的已凍結; 它們只能參考所複製。The and methods can improve copying performance because they do not clone sub-objects that are already frozen; they only copy them by reference. 下表摘要說明之間的差異和方法。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |動作Action|GetAsFrozen 方法行為GetAsFrozen method behavior|GetCurrentValueAsFrozen 方法行為GetCurrentValueAsFrozen method behavior| |------------|---------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |複製相依性屬性的運算式Copying a dependency property that has an expression|方法會擲回因為它無法屬性。The method throws an because it cannot the property.|複製目前的運算式值，而不是運算式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |複製動畫相依性屬性Copying an animated dependency property|屬性的基底 （非動畫） 值會複製。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.|複製屬性的目前的動畫的值。The property's current animated value is copied. 不會複製動畫。Animations are not copied.| 請注意，未設定的屬性不會複製，也不是唯讀屬性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties. 若要建立一份也就是不被凍結，使用方法。To create a copy of the that is not frozen, use the method.

span.span: Makes the current instance a frozen clone of the specified .

span.span: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

block.para:
如果您是衍生自，您可能需要覆寫這個方法。
If you derive from , you may need to override this method.
若要覆寫的原因包括：
Reasons to override include the following:
- 您的衍生的類別會具有不會公開透過相依性屬性的資料。Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.
- 您的衍生的類別必須執行額外的初始設定工作無法完成的作業只是覆寫。Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .比方說，這適用於您的衍生的類別實作。For example, this applies if your derived class implements .類別，將所有的資料儲存在相依性屬性和，不需要執行額外的初始設定工作不需要覆寫。Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .它是不可或缺的所有實作都呼叫這個方法的基底實作。It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.實作應該只會執行不會執行的預設實作的工作。Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.預設實作會建立新使用方法，讓的凍結 freezable 的深層複本的所有其他可寫入的淺層複本在本機設定和它所包含的屬性。The default implementation creates a new using the method and makes deep copies of unfrozen freezables and shallow copies of all other writable, locally set properties it contains.如果物件具有資料繫結的相依性屬性，資料繫結會複製，但可能不能再解析;如需複製的資料繫結物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the data bindings are copied but might no longer resolve; for more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).如果物件具有動畫相依性屬性，複製目前的動畫的值，這些屬性時，但不是動畫。If the object has animated dependency properties, the current animated value of those properties is copied, but the animations are not.唯讀相依性屬性內不會複製此預設實作。Read-only dependency properties within a are not copied by this default implementation.如果您不要覆寫這個方法，您必須呼叫基底實作。If you do override this method, you must call the base implementation.您不需要值的複製。You do not need to values as they are copied.結果由凍結在傳回之前。The result is frozen by before being returned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFrozen As Boolean
public: property bool IsFrozen { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，該值表示物件目前是否可修改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is currently modifiable.

value.span: 如果物件凍結而且無法修改則為 ，如果物件是可以修改的則為 。

span.span: if the object is frozen and cannot be modified; if the object can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘗試修改的物件時其屬性是`true`會擲回。Attempting to modify an object when its property is `true` throws an . 這個屬性是唯讀，從物件模型的觀點來看。This property is read-only from the object model perspective. 部分的相關文件行為可能提及 」 設定至`true`"或類似的語言，討論的其他方法的行為時，但這種行為中發生的情況內部的類別執行個體，當執行個體方法操作存在於抽象類別的私用變數。Some of the documentation about behaviors may mention "sets to `true`" or similar language when discussing the behavior of other methods of , but this behavior is happening internally in the class instances, when methods of the instance manipulate the private variables that exist within the abstract class. 若要設定這個屬性的值，您應該呼叫。To set the value of this property, you should call . 這實際上是一次性的操作，若要變更屬性從初始預設`false`狀態`true`狀態。This effectively is a one-time operation to change the property from the initial default `false` state to the `true` state. 沒有任何可用的方法，來將值設定回`false`。There is no available means to set the value back to `false`. 相反地，您可以變更任何與原始版本進行的深層複本 (請參閱方法)。Instead, you could change any deep copy made from the original (see the method). 這是根據設計，而且當套用至案例時，任何衍生的類別應該如何運作所在模式就很有用。This is by design and is how any derived class should behave when applied to the cases where the pattern is useful.

span.span: Verifies that the is not frozen and that it is being accessed from a valid threading context.

summary.span: 在任何 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] 將資料寫入至非相依性屬性的資料成員之前， 繼承者應該在 API 的開頭呼叫這個方法。

span.span: inheritors should call this method at the beginning of any [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] that writes to data members that are not dependency properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫確認的執行緒內容可供存取，而且它會擲回例外狀況，如果已凍結執行個體。This method calls to verify the threading context is accessible, and it throws an exception if the instance is already frozen.

exception.span: 執行個體已凍結，無法寫入它的成員。

span.span: The instance is frozen and cannot have its members written to.

para.span: 類別衍生自應該呼叫之前嘗試寫入不相依性屬性的任何成員。

span.span: Classes that derive from should call before attempting to write to any members that are not dependency properties.

para.span: 如果您呼叫中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]，您可以省略呼叫。

span.span: If you call in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], you can omit a call to .
